review: Tasty place with great yummy cheese- and tartar-burgers! The French fries are very crispy. And great apocalyptic ceiling if you can raise your eyes up after a good beer‚Ä¶ ;)

review: Great burger. Much better than Holy Burger. Steak was very good, I just wish it came with a bit of salad.

review: We just ate 2 famous mimosa burger with my friend and we both hated it. It was undelicious, even thought the meat is medium rare, it is not jusy at all. And the meat has not been minced properly. The meat is in between the meat/beef and minced meat. What a disappointment‚Ä¶ Sorry for the restaurant but you burger sucks‚Ä¶
name: Burak Ayta√ß

review: Tasteless burger buns, extremely slow and unorganized service. During the 35 minutes staff managed to deliver only the half of the order, namely 1 burger out of 3, 1 appetizer and 3 drinks. The funniest thing that our burgers actually made it out of the kitchen, but were served to other people because of waiter‚Äôs mistake.
name: Eugene Ivanchenko

review: This place has a potential, but a lot of work must be done. Regular cheeseburger has a small patty,  their specialty burger while having a wonderful meat is plain. Fries are too salty. But the service is great and with some fixes to the recipes this place will be great.
name: Anton Gulyi

review: Do not ever order delivery from them. Ordered and paid for 2 burgers. Took them 1.5 hours to deliver and brought only 1 burger (and it was cold). When trying to call back they did not pick up for the rest of the evening.
name: Orest Ryvak

review: Tasty, great quality of ingredients and really amazing American vibe!
name: Mr Joker

review: Service is really slow and chaotic. Hostess was nice, though. They also mixed up my order and gave me the wrong burger so I had to wait even more for a right one. Food was fine but nothing spectacular.
name: Oleg Plisov

review: The pizza was awesome, but staff were so slow.

review: Tasteless burger bun. Mild Bloody Mary. There are much better burger joints in Kyiv.
